name: Awesome Christmas Holiday Cookies Dessert - Food Maker
name_original: Awesome Christmas Holiday Cookies Dessert - Food Maker
description:
Right on time with the holiday festivities! Christmas isn't the same with delicious, hot cookies straight out from the oven!

Celebrate by creating delicious cookies with numerous unique flavors and designs!

[Features]
-Make your own cookie batter from scratch!
-Mix N match your flavors and choose your desired cookie shape!
-Set the timer and BAKE!
-Decorate your cookies with icing & CANDY!
-Save N share your favorite cookies with friends and family!


Perfect game for the holidays! Download now!





[Note]
-This game is free to play but offers in-game transactions made with real money.
